welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hermosa Beach, where the sun, sand, and surf await you! Known for its laid-back vibe and pristine coastline, we invite you to soak up the charm of our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore to your heart's content!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Torrance Airport primarily serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves most international flights and some domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and select international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Whiteman Airport is used exclusively for private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
